## partialType() function

Constructs a [Type](./paratype.type.md) that represents a partial record with the specified properties

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function partialType<T extends Record<string, unknown>>(properties: PropertyTypes<T, (string & keyof T)[]>): Type<WithRecordOptions<T, (string & keyof T)[]>>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  properties | [PropertyTypes](./paratype.propertytypes.md)<!-- -->&lt;T, (string &amp; keyof T)\[\]&gt; | Properties of the record. Must be an object where keys provide property names, and values their [Type](./paratype.type.md) |

<b>Returns:</b>

[Type](./paratype.type.md)<!-- -->&lt;[WithRecordOptions](./paratype.withrecordoptions.md)<!-- -->&lt;T, (string &amp; keyof T)\[\]&gt;&gt;
